content:
@everyone sorry for the ping but its official, i'm making it.

(if any of you are sprite artists, programmers, or composers: reach out to me in dms if you'd like to help, this is a unity C# project)

it will be in worldbox pixel style and its still a god simulator but it will be very different in mechanics. 

also for now it will be free but eventually it may be 2$
author: tuxxego

content:
@everyone heya everyone sorry for the multiple pings but I have a very important proposal i want y'all to decide on. 

WorldBox's update is close to releasing and I really do not want to update my mods for it, and I want to continue <:m2:1310335171735846964>, so, I want to transform<:m2:1310335171735846964> from a simple mod to its own game. Hear my out because I know this sounds insane, but imagine WorldBox but it's actually built for modern mods and shit. Also it would have complete modding support.

So, would you support this new game or should I stick to WorldBox? 

(PS it would get frequent updates and would be free)

tell me in <#1109919955094343723>

Also I want to expand the development team, but more news on that soon.

# CALLING ALL TRANSLATORS!!! # 

In the SpaceBox ***Exporations*** update, one of the many new features is a localization system!

content:
@everyone hello! I'm happy to announce that this server is now for multiple projects instead of just worldbox ones! Don't worry SpaceBox (and ModernBox to an extent) are still being worked on, but i also want to share some other stuff here. 

If you hadn't already, go to <id:customize> and select modernbox updates and/or spacebox updates as everyone pings will not be used unless they are very needed. 

i've also added channels for <#1295523218874171432>  too, so you should check that out!

This change was also made because the WorldBox update will one day come and i don't want this server to die when that happens.

content:
@everyone alright i'm going to be honest i've not enjoyed making wb mods for a few months now, and constantly taking care of them and many discord servers has driven me insane, i'm failing two different classess because of how much time i spend working on stuff and due to having surgery recently that's made me be online even more.

This server is almost at 2k people, many people have joined and turned into extremely active people, and then left or went on breaks, i've never been on break here, over a year and i've been constantly active here. 

don't get me wrong i love this server and i love modernbox and spacebox, but i need to fix myself and get back on track with school and stuff.

so that's why i have to announce that i'm taking my first real break from modding and this server, i can't deteriorate any further. so i'm giving ownership to <@790071577143672849> for a while.
author: tuxxego

content:
@everyone late announcement but today (9/18) marks one year since this server became public and <@1107290378194919454> joined. 

when i started modernbox i was depressed, and had went through shit, and a year ago if you told me this server would grow to 1,879 people I wouldn't believe you. 

That's why today I'm announcing the final ModernBox update, which will be fixing toggles, overhauling stats, and a few more things, it will be focused on improving instead of adding, because i know so many of you have asked for fixes. 

additionally spacebox will be recieving its major update soon, with "planet parameters"

also, one other mod that I announced over a year ago that many people thought was dead, is in development.
